pull.title: Enable mempool consistency checks in unit tests
pull.body:
This helped me discovered #8220.

I can't measure any slowdown for running the unit tests.

events.message: Enable mempool consistency checks in unit tests

events.body: Tested ACK.   Just a very slight reservation that perhaps a consistency check being enabled someday hides a bug.

Sounds like a good idea to me, concept ACK.

> Just a very slight reservation that perhaps a consistency check being enabled someday hides a bug.

This just adds checks I, hope? It doesn't ever _correct_ consistency?

issue.title: Enable mempool consistency test, don't trim when empty
issue.body:
Cherry-picks:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8222 Enable mempool consistency checks in unit tests
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8220 Stop trimming when mapTx is empty
